attributes.action: give students a reduced tv license fee in shared accommodation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This particularly corresponds to halls of residence with locked doors. In a normal household the cost of a tv license would usually be spread over more than one person. To expect each student to pay the full amount which may lead to 6 seperate tv licenses for 6 students in one flat is extortionate.
